text: Necessary Roughness is an American drama television series. It aired from June 29, 2011 to August 21, 2013. It stars Callie Thorne and Scott Cohen. The second season premiered on June 6, 2012. The one-hour drama series was picked up for 12 episodes on January 19, 2011. On January 7, 2013, USA Network announced the series was renewed for a 10-episode third season, which premiered on June 12, 2013. On November 19, 2013, it was canceled after three seasons. title: Necessary Roughness (TV series)
